item.title: By: matt
item.dc:creator: matt
item.description: <p>after spending the vast majority of the last two days working on this, the servlet is now beginning to take shape.<br/> <br/> it always gets very depressing when you spend a huge amount of time on something and it there isn't a huge amount to show for it. but it is very stable and performs well which the main thing.</p>
item.content:encoded:
after spending the vast majority of the last two days working on this, the servlet is now beginning to take shape.

it always gets very depressing when you spend a huge amount of time on something and it there isn’t a huge amount to show for it. but it is very stable and performs well which the main thing.
